actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To repeal the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which expanded the penalty taxes on early distributions from retirement plans.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 (and consequent amendments of the Internal Revenue Code) that impose a penalty tax on early distributions from qualified retirement plans, including individual retirement accounts and annuities.

titles.title: To repeal the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which expanded the penalty taxes on early distributions from retirement plans.
